backend/main.mo: Actor storing per-caller conversion history, allowing entries to be added and retrieved sorted by timestamp.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature-to-file mappings and metadata describing supported app capabilities and test coverage.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for major frontend files used as build planning reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables defining the appâ€™s warm neutral color palette for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component managing the full conversion flow, state transitions, and history panel rendering.
frontend/src/components/BrandHeader.tsx: Renders the branded header with logo, title, and tagline.
frontend/src/features/converter/Converte: Form for entering and validating TikTok URLs before conversion flow begins.
frontend/src/features/converter/Download: Runs the demo conversion, shows output settings and progress, and triggers file download.
frontend/src/features/converter/EmptySta: Landing hero section introducing the app and guiding users to start a conversion.
frontend/src/features/converter/PresetPi: Renders a selectable grid of conversion presets using cards and a radio group.
Defines conversion preset metadata and provides a lookup function by ID.
frontend/src/features/converter/useMp4Ex: Implements a mock MP4 export hook that generates a JPEG frame and tracks progress/errors.
frontend/src/features/converter/validato: Validates TikTok URLs and returns structured validation results.
frontend/src/features/history/HistoryPan: Displays conversion history with table view, links, and delete actions.
frontend/src/features/history/historySto: Manages localStorage persistence for conversion history entries.
frontend/src/features/history/historyTyp: Declares the HistoryEntry type used for conversion history records.
frontend/src/features/history/useHistory: Combines backend and local conversion history with add/delete operations via React Query.
frontend/src/features/results/ResultsScr: Shows the conversion result preview, download button, preset info, and YouTube upload steps.
frontend/src/features/results/uploadGuid: Contains static step-by-step guidance for uploading converted videos to YouTube.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity auth state and interactions using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a React Query hook that fetches conversion history from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and defines CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing requirements, features, assets, and current state.
